About the Company: Choksi Laboratories Limited (CLL), is widely known as a leading analysis and research group, providing complete solutions for improving quality in processes, products and services.The company is a contract testing and analysis laboratory, they analyze, for their clients, or as a regulatory requirement, pharmaceuticals, food and agricultural products, construction materials, chemicals etc. They also help industries in their research processes. Their environment consultancy division also helps firms in keeping the environment clean and free from pollution.Services offered by the company include Contract Laboratory Services (CLS):-Pharmaceutical Analysis-Food & Beverages Analysis-Water Analysis-Construction Material Analysis,Instrument Calibration & Validation Services,Environment Management Services,Clinical Research,Consultancy and Assaying & Hallmarking.
